admob_UMP_enable.description: Show admob UMP consent popup or not

level_internet_require.description: Allow user can play game offline utils this level (value in range 0 - 999999999999999999)

ad_aoa_openapp.description: Show AOA when open app or not

ad_aoa_openapp_first_install.description: Show AOA for first install or not

ad_aoa_max_enable.description: true: use AOA max. false: use AOA Admob. (if true and max return no ad eligible then use Admob fallback)

ad_banner_from_played_times.description: Value=0 mean banner will show immediatly after first open loading finished. Banner will destroyed and reload for every scene loaded callback. Played times are counted for each level start triggered.

ad_banner_from_level.description: Same as played_times but use level (1 level can has many played_times)

ad_banner_reload_capping.description: The seconds interval will be reload banner. Set value=0 to use reload interval from console.

ad_banner_reload_level_capping.description: Banner will be destroy and reload new one when load scene or not. Value 0 mean never destroy. Example: value = 1 mean banner will be reload for each complete 1 levels.

ad_banner_adaptive_enable.description: Use adaptive banner or smart banner for Ironsource or Max

ad_banner_collapsible_enable.description: (Admob only) Use collapsible for banner or not (If true, also need to set value to true for param ad_banner_enable)

ad_banner_collapsible_fallback_enable.description: Use other mediation if load collapsible failed or not

ad_banner_collapsible_auto_refresh.description: If true, collapsible will auto reload and popup after interval setup from admob console (30-120s), else it only reload by logic in game

ad_banner_collapsible_reload_interval.description: The interval in seconds which collapsible can show popup (trigger show by logic ingame), only work in case `banner_collapsible_auto_refresh`=false

ad_inter_resume_enable.description: Show Interstitial when resume or not (if both AOA and Inter resume enable, prefer AOA)

ad_resume_capping.description: The interval (seconds) for pause time to show ad resume

ad_resume_enable.description: Show AOA or Interstitial when resume or not

ad_resume_from_played_times.description: For first install only, played times are counted for each level start triggered.

ad_aoa_resume_enable.description: Show AOA when resume game or not (if both AOA and Inter resume enable, prefer AOA)

ad_inter_after_reward_capping.description: the interval (seconds) for inter can be show from last rewarded ad closed

ad_inter_capping.description: (ads_interval) the interval (seconds) to show next inter from last inter closed

ad_inter_from_played_times.description: Use for first inter, only show if match all condition from played times + from level + from seconds. (Played times are counted for each level start triggered.)

ad_inter_from_level.description: Use for first inter, only show if match all condition from played times + from level + from seconds

ad_inter_from_seconds.description: Use for first inter, only show if match all condition from played times + from level + from seconds

ad_inter_force_capping.description: the interval (seconds) to show next inter from last force inter trigger. This is independence with `ad_inter_capping`

ad_inter_force_enable.description: Force inter after x seconds, usefull incase endless level or level need very long time to finish

rating_popup_level_capping.description: If user never rated, Rate popup will show when total levels played from open app equal this value (Only show one times for each open app session)

debug_devices.description: List of SystemInfo.deviceUnique, GAID, IDFA which needs to turn on full log and cheat (seperate by ',')

ad_test_devices_ios.description: List IDFA of iOS device to get ad test (seperate by ',')

ad_test_devices_android.description: List GAID of android device to get ad test (seperate by ',')
